result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert James Barnes

records.addlTxt:
Robert James Barnes not in court. 
The Milwaukee County Sheriff's Office has cleared the active warrant, provided the next court date to the defendant, and requested the warrant be withdrawn with approval of Deputy Chief Judge Carl Ashley. MCSO advised defendant to appear in Room 221 of the Safety Building, in person, at 1:00 PM on 11-23-2022.

Defendant Robert James Barnes not in court.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court for Robert James Barnes.  Attorney Sarah Dahdouh for Nate McClure in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued REMAND TO COMMISSIONER.  Court takes no action on bail at this time.

Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court.  Nate Kristian McClure appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until the next court date.  Calendar call scheduled for August 25, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Robert James Barnes in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Nate Kristian McClure appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Robert James Barnes appeared by video means with Attorney. Defense counsel has received discovery and offer and requests additional time to review. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.   All parties are advised effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to a Branch of RESERVE JUDGES.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Robert James Barnes in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM. Case in court for pre-trial conference. 
Defense advises the Court they are in receipt of discovery and offer and request an adjournment to review offer with client. 
Court orders matter adjourned. Case remains calendared in Br. 37.  Status conference scheduled for June 9, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Robert James Barnes
Current: 3730 East Karsten Drive, Madison, WI 53704 United States  (Effective: 05-12-2022)
Prior: 3730 East Karsten Drive, Milwaukee, WI 53704
Justice Point Pretrial Services Discharge Report received and filed.
Justice Point Violation (Missed Office Contact) Report received and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  
The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  
Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Defendant Robert James Barnes in court with attorney Fred Richardson.  Defendant Robert James Barnes in custody.  Michael R Staskunas appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Robert James Barnes appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/3c595ccd-39e3-09d4-8db1-82162d766d4f  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 12, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
